channel.title: Looking for a dev team
channel.description:
hello all i am looking for a team of devs that know what they are doing as i am constantly doing other projects and dont have time to dev my rs server.
it is a 562 server. looking for coders for the server and client the server is on a vps that is 24/7 had a few problems in the past with getting things handled but only down time on the vps is when im doing a system reboot.
the vps has 24/7 teamviewer access only time someone wont be able to access it is when someone else is online. (unless more than one can connect at a time on teamviewer never tried so unsure of this.
application:
Position (client or server dev) : Experience(how many years) : Ever owned a rsps?: Have been into rsps' for (how many years): Age: Online time (approx time you can dedicate to the server per day?):
you can contact me on msn at sflannery@email.itt-tech.edu or yahoo at smfjr03@yahoo.com

item.title: Looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

You can have a few people on your teamviewer at the same time, you need to take turns though.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @muubo muubo
item.description:
@muubo wrote:

well i would put pics but im too lazy right now i will get them up when i have a chance i gotta sell my cars today tho so im busy today but hopefully some people would be interested in deving you can demo the server at disturbedrs.freeforums.org (thats our forums) client is on there

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Id add info like pictures and stuff to attract more people and making them want to join, and also I don’t think you can do more then 1 ppl on team viewer since theres only 1 cursor being used by 2 people

Read full topic
